lead_paragraph: An effort known as a static kill is part of a two-pronged strategy to kill the well in the Gulf of Mexico by cementing it shut from above and below.
snippet: An effort known as a static kill is part of a two-pronged strategy to kill the well in the Gulf of Mexico by cementing it shut from above and below.

headline.main: Officials Optimistic That Cement Will Kill BP Well
headline.seo: Optimism That Cement Will Shut Down Gulf Oil Well
headline.print_headline: Optimism That Cement Will Shut Down Gulf Well
